DOC.brief_summary: Ofatumumab IgG1κ fully human monoclonal antibody ( mAb ) specifically recognize epitope human differentiation antigen CD20 molecule . In vitro vivo study demonstrate ofatumumab depletes CD20 positive ( CD20+ ) B cell complement-dependent cytotoxicity ( CDC ) antibody-dependent cell-mediated cytotoxicity ( ADCC ) , result antitumour effect . This open-label study evaluate safety , tolerability , efficacy PK profile ofatumumab monotherapy chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) patient . Ofatumumab administer intravenously first dose 300mg follow 7 weekly infusion 2000mg , follow 4 infusion 2000mg every 4 week . Primary objective study ( Part A ) evaluate tolerability , study ( Part B ) ass overall response rate CLL population . 10 subject enrol study . Subjects follow 48 week .
